name: df-shft
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cshi, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, cc, copab(s2, s3, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cc), wbr(co(cv(s2), cmin, cv(s1)), cv(s0), cv(s3))))))
comment: Define a function shifter. This operation offsets the value argument of a function (ordinarily on a subset of ` CC ` ) and produces a new function on ` CC ` . See ~ shftval for its value. (Contributed by NM, 20-Jul-2005.)
